snippet: The Islamabad High Court (IHC) has once again restored Zaka Ashraf as chairman of the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB)....

headline.print_headline: Court Restores Ashraf as Pakistan Chairman
headline.main: Court Restores Ashraf as Pakistan Chairman

lead_paragraph: The Islamabad High Court (IHC) has once again restored Zaka Ashraf as chairman of the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB).
